en.greeting:
>> Hello! Welcome to the loan calculator!
>> You can quit anytime by inputting the letter Q on your keyboard!
en.loanAmount:
>> What is your current loan amount?
>> Please enter the value in numbers, such as: '320.5'
en.aprAmount:
>> What is your current APR (Annual Percentage Rate?)
>> Please enter your value in the following format: '5' for 5%
en.inputInvalid: >> I'm sorry, that input was not valid. Please try again!
en.loanLength:
>> How long is currently left on your loan?
>> Please enter the values months. For example, 13 is 1 year, 1 month. 5 is 5 months.
en.again: >> Input Q if you wish to exit! Otherwise, let's calculate another loan! Input anything to continue!
en.goodbye: >> Thank you for using the loan calculator! Have a wonderful day!
